text_raw:
2. The 19th day of April 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 
Redundancy Payments (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 3 of 2022), other than 
section 4, shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 April, 2022. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [174] 3 

EXPLANTORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
Interpretation) 

This order provides for the commencement, from 19 April 2022, of the 
Redundancy Payments (Amendment) Act 2022, other than Section 4. This Act 
amends the Redundancy Payments Act 1967 in order to provide a legislative 
basis for a “Covid-19 related lay-off payment”, to be paid from the Social 
Insurance Fund.
